p: A nonlinear globular G2 dendrimer comprising citric acid and PEG-600, adjuvanticity effect of which was investigated in veterinary rabies vaccine, did not show significant toxic effect in J774A.1 cells and ensured higher survival rate in the mice after virus challenge in vivo due to adjuvanticity effect of dendrimer resulting in rising of neutralizing antibodies against rabies virus and thus enhancing immune responses (Asgary et al. 2018).
